There are three types of users inside of: There are three types of users inside of GlobaLeaks: the administrator, the receivers and the whistleblower. Your username for accessing the node as administrator will be 'admin'.

This interface may help you spot anomali: Esta interface poderá ajudá-lo a detetar as anomalias no seu Nodo.
This interface may help you understand h: This interface may help you understand how the Node is currently configured and get some info on how to connect to other GlobaLeaks users and experts.

This interface may help you understand how the Node is used by the whistleblower. We present you with the submissions currently on the node and a few statistics on the kind of usage (activity, files, comments).
This interface permits to configure emai: This interface permits to configure email templates used for secure mail notifications.
This interface permits to configure email templates used for unsecure mail notifications.
This interface shows the activity of the: This interface shows the activity of the users of your node. This may be helpful in detecting anomalies and supporting the Receivers of your node.
This interface shows the latest anomalie: This interface shows the latest anomalies spotted by the system.
This interface shows you the statistics: This interface shows you the statistics for the last hours.
